description:
Instagram has 300 million active monthly users

It’s the first question any manager will ask about a social network: are people actually using it? 

With Instagram, you can respond with a resounding YES. With 300 million monthly active users and counting, Instagram users have proven their love for the platform.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instagram users have shared over 30 billion photos to date, and now share an average of 70 million photos per day!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now, ask yourself: Is your business on Instagram? 

If not yet, don't be afraid of this engaging platform and in this course learn about it to bits and start managing your own Instagram account for business. 

If you offer a product or service, maintain a storefront, or have knowledge, advice or offers to share with your customers, it’s probably worth it. If you don’t do any of the above? You might not actually be in business.

So, why to wait, hit the 'Start Learning Now' button and Let's Get Started >>
title: Instagram Marketing: Insights from an Instagram Marketer
